title: Learner-Tailored Language Learning Environment Design and Implementation

context.additional_context: A learner-driven environment utilizing personal devices (BYOD), aimed at enhancing job-related language proficiency within corporate settings.

learning_goals: Learners can select and configure digital tools (apps/platforms) aligned with their language learning goals.
Learners perform language activities in self-directed learning environments they have configured with a frequency of over 80%.
Learners improve communication skills by 30% within four weeks using content (audio/text) produced in a personalized learning environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
